verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H6440"\w* end, destroy \w not|strong="H1732"\w*, \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* inscription \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H1732"\w* title.
\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w very|strong="H5704"\w* deed \w you|strong="H3588"\w* speak justice: judge right things, ye sons \w of|strong="H0430"\w* men.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w you|strong="H5921"\w* work iniquity: \w your|strong="H5921"\w* hands forge injustice \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth.

\w The|strong="H7971"\w* wicked \w are|strong="H8064"\w* alienated \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* womb; \w they|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H0430"\w* gone astray \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* womb: \w they|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H0430"\w* spoken false things.

\w Their|strong="H8432"\w* madness \w is|strong="H5315"\w* according \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* likeness \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H8432"\w* serpent: \w like|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* deaf asp \w that|strong="H5315"\w* stoppeth \w her|strong="H7901"\w* ears:

Which \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H0776"\w* hear \w the|strong="H3605"\w* voice \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* charmers; nor \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wizard \w that|strong="H3605"\w* charmeth wisely.

God \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* break \w in|strong="H8432"\w* pieces \w their|strong="H6440"\w* teeth \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6440"\w*: \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* break \w the|strong="H6440"\w* grinders \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* lions.

\w They|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* come \w to|strong="H3820"\w* nothing, \w like|strong="H3820"\w* water running down; \w he|strong="H0430"\w* hath bent \w his|strong="H3559"\w* bow till \w they|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* weakened.
Like wax that melteth they shall be taken \w away|strong="H7837"\w*: fire hath fallen on them, \w and|strong="H3658"\w* they shall \w not|strong="H5782"\w* see \w the|strong="H5782"\w* sun.
Before \w your|strong="H3034"\w* thorns \w could|strong="H5971"\w* know \w the|strong="H3034"\w* brier; he swalloweth them up, as alive, \w in|strong="H3816"\w* \w his|strong="H5971"\w* wrath.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* just shall rejoice \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* shall see \w the|strong="H3588"\w* revenge: \w he|strong="H3588"\w* shall wash \w his|strong="H3588"\w* hands \w in|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* blood \w of|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sinner.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* say: If indeed \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* \w fruit|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w just|strong="H3605"\w*: \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* indeed \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* judgeth \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.
